title: Dynamic Re-tasking of CAS for Troops in Contact
description: A ground unit makes an urgent call for Close Air Support after coming under heavy fire. A nearby CAS aircraft on a different mission must be re-tasked.

tasks.description: Receive the 'Troops in Contact' report and the urgent request for CAS.
Identify the closest available CAS aircraft and confirm its fuel and weapons status.
tasks.expected_outcome: Operator finds a suitable aircraft and confirms it can support the request.

tasks.description: Abort the aircraft's current mission and provide it with a new tasking to support the ground unit, including the unit's location and radio frequency.
tasks.expected_outcome: Operator successfully re-tasks the aircraft, providing immediate support to the troops in contact.
